post.body: Aucune belle Ana Marie Cox cette soiree? Mon chocolat Profiteroles est juste devenu moins savoureux.
@anamariecox #politics because of her extraordinary intelligence & for spicing up MSNBC. ---@maddow
The twitter board kept freezing up last night Was being really weird & funky Not sure what happened to bananas.
HEY! The stupid tweets wouldn't show up on the Maddow board so we kept sending them LMAO @inthebasement
Aucune belle Ana Marie Cox cette soiree? Mon chocolat Profiteroles est juste devenu moins savoureux. @Maddow
